input.label: Now I will ask about the contact you had with the confirmed case between [two days before confirmed case's symptom onset] and today's date.
Contact is defined as direct physical contact (touching) or being closer than 2 meters (6 feet) from a person with COVID-19.

select1.label: Was the confirmed case a member of your household during this time period?

input.label: If no, specify Other type of contact:
How many nights during this time period have you slept in the same house as [confirmed case]? (number of nights)

select1.label: Did you share the same sleeping quarters?
Did you share meals?

input.label: On average, how many hours during the day did you spend in close contact (within 2 meters/6 feet) of [confirmed case]? (hours)
Date of contact with confirmed case?
Duration of close contact (within 2 meters/6 feet)
input.hint: Enter duration and check the next box whether it was in MINUTES or HOURS

select1.label: duration in minutes or hours?
Setting in which contact occurred

item.label: In transit (e.g. matatu, private car, etc.) (specify)

input.label: In the next few questions I will ask about any pre-existing health conditions you currently have, or have had in the past.
For female contacts – what was the date of your last menstrual period?

select1.label: For female contacts – are you currently pregnant?
Trimester

input.label: What is your weight in kg?

select1.label: Please select the body shape that, in your opinion, most closely matches your own body shape.**Contact's self-reported body shape **
select1.hint: Note: have respondent identify it from the chart

select1.label: Contact's assessed body shape
Has a doctor ever told you that you need to lose some weight?
Have you ever had cancer?
Do you have diabetes?
Have you ever been tested for HIV?
If ever tested, what was the result of your last HIV test?
select1.hint: If last HIV test result was positive, are you currently taking antiretroviral treatment (ART)?

input.label: * Offer HIV testing and counselling today if HIV status unknown or if no HIV-negative result documented in last 3 months

group.label: "If on ART, record the details of the medication"

input.label: If on ART, visually observe and record medication
If on ART, visually observe and record dosage
If on ART, month and year started ART

select1.label: Have you ever had heart disease?
